content: भ्राज् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (भ्राजते) To shine, gleam. flash, glitter; रुरुजुर्भ्रेजिरे फेणुर्बहुधा हरिराक्षसाः <ls>Bk. 14. 78</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">15. 24.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To illuminate, irradiate. --WITH वि to shine brilliantly or intensely; बिभ्राजसे मकरकेतनमर्चयन्ती <ls>Ratn. 1. 21.</ls>
